entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY, Old Crow
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:31 p.m. MST Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.8Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Old Crow Airport 10:00 PM MST Thursday 20 April 2023
Temperature: -4.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -8.4°C
Wind: E 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending before morning then cloudy. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 20 April 2023
